name: World of Warships: Legends. Navy Warrior
name_original: World of Warships: Legends. Navy Warrior
description:
Action. Danger. Adventure.

Join the Navy with British Destroyer Campbeltown, made in America!

Also comes with 3 days of Premium Account and an assortment of currencies and boosters to aid you in your naval conquest!

This pack contains:

• Tier II destroyer Campbeltown
• 3 days of Premium Account
• 250 doubloons
• 1,125,000 credits
• 20 common boosters of each type
